description:
BTW⁣
⁣
You are in control of your feed. On social media. On tv. The narrative. 📱⁣
⁣
There is NOTHING wrong with unfollowing, taking a break, “seeing less of”, leaving groups, or muting. Three things:⁣
⁣
1) placing boundaries is an act of love for both the other person AND yourself ⁣
⁣
2) it isn’t personal. Do what’s best for you. In this current season. As you need it. Whether it’s for business, personal, health, WHATEVER. ⁣
⁣
3) YOUR WORTH IS NOT IN WHAT YOU DO, are a part of, your friends list and your following. ⁣
⁣
With the Limited time we all have in the day, and even more limited time that we are on social media, do yourself a favor, and don’t be afraid to do these things. You can change your narrative at any time 💓💓🤜🏻🤜🏻. you are LOVED and worthy just as you are 🌻⁣
⁣

#valorup⁣
#takecourage⁣
#ownyournarrative
#hippiemama
